TopicTitle: I need help on multiple engine fx on 1 fuel tank.

Articles.Content:
I made an horizontal fuel tank with 4 integrated liquid engine. The 4 engine work properly but only 1 fx work. The 3 others wont appear. I tried to copy and paste the fx 3 times to get 4 full sets of fx but it seem to not working that way. How i can set my fx for each engine in 1 part.cfg ?

I need help for attachments nodes too. The empty gameobject method. I seek for a good texturer too.

My engine are set like this

Thrustvectortransformname = Droper Engine R1

Thrustvectortransformname = Droper Engine R2

Thrustvectortransformname = Droper Engine L1

Thrustvectortransformname = Droper Engine L2

There are a way to set fx like this ?
